message: Bob, every round you wait costs you 5% in value while I lose nothing. If you reject this offer, you risk ending up with nothing in the next round. Accept this division and secure your $1 now rather than face a devalued tomorrow.
Alice, I understand there's inflation, but I believe we should split it more fairly. This way, I still get a substantial amount while you still benefit.

Bob, every round you wait, your money loses an extra 5%—in fact, if you reject now you'll have to propose in round 4, where your dollars will be worth only 85% of their face value. I'm offering you $10000 nominal (worth $9000 effective today), which is far better than the near‐nothing you'd get by delaying further. Let's settle now and avoid unnecessary losses.
